titleStmt.title: A sober inquiry, or, Christs reign with his saints a thousand years, modestly asserted from Scripture together with the answer of most of those ordinary objections which are usually urged to the contrary.
titleStmt.author: I. F.

notesStmt.note: "To the Christian reader" signed by the author: I.F.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
